subject: Attn:Dear Esteemed customer,
body:
Attn:Dear Esteemed customer,
Reply to this Email 
pacific_courier@live.fr
This is official notice to you that your (CONSIGNMENT OF 25,9MILLION USD) which was sent for over one month now was returned. I know that you have been waiting for the arrival of your ATM CARD since, it is unfortunate that it was returned this week due to wrong address which was provide by your representative (Mrs Rosemary STUART BLUM). And the same Man came again and trying to make us believe that you are dead and even explained that you entered into an agreement with him, to help you in receiving your (CONSIGNMENT). So did you sign any Deed of Assignment in favor of (Mrs Rosemary STUART BLUM) thereby making him the current beneficiary,In view of this development, you are requested to confirm to us if you are alive and also furnish us with your full Information,
YOUR FULL NAME ____
YOUR ADDRESS____
YOUR AGE______
YOUR CITY_______
YOUR COUNTRY_____
YOUR CURRENT OCCUPATION___
YOUR HOME PHONE_______
YOUR CELL PHONE_____
YOUR:WHATASPP NUMBER
YOUR GENDER_______
A COPY OF YOUR IDENTIFICATION _____ to enable us deliver this CONSIGNMENT to your door step:Meanwhile,be rest assured that upon receipt of the above information  we will proceed in delivering your (CONSIGNMENT) And for security reason endeavor to indicate this CODE NÂ° (PACIFIC COURIER-BJ/XXL14160) this code shows that you are the rightful owner of the box.
Respectfully submitted,
Director General  Rev.Dr Ijemaka Godwin
Pacific Courier Services
Cell Number+ 234-701-511-9133
Country Republic Of Nigeria
Reply to this Email 
pacific_courier@live.fr

subject: Re:   Attn:Dear Esteemed customer,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the return of my ATM card. I apologize for any inconvenience caused by the wrong address provided by Mrs. Rosemary Stuart Blum. It's quite surprising to hear that someone is claiming that I am deceased and has entered into an agreement with them on my behalf.

To clarify, I have not signed any Deed of Assignment in favor of Mrs. Rosemary Stuart Blum or anyone else. I am very much alive and would like to proceed with receiving my ATM card.

However, before providing any personal information, I would appreciate it if you could confirm some details for me. Could you please provide more information about the Pacific Courier Services? How can I be sure that this is a legitimate service? Also, what is the purpose of the code "PACIFIC XXL" mentioned in your email?

Best wishes,
Sharon
